title: Why lose L.P when people disconnect?
body:
Had 2 D/C's in one game pre 15 minutes, one returned at around 17 minutes. by then it was over anyway.

And yet i still lose L.P for something beyond my control?

Why are people penalized for things like that? Pro teams don't play 4v5 they get a pause for their technical issues.

Because if they made it so disconnecting from a game prevent LP losses then it would obviously get abused. Don't want to demote? Tell someone to take one for the team (in this case your duo) to DC.

I imagine the reason is that, if one team is losing SUPER bad, and one guy agrees to take the fall and be the only one to lose LP, then it would encourage people to just take the 15 minute or hour DC ban for their teammates, especially if they queued as a group.  Someone could agree to DC if everyone gives him some amount of RP, which then translates to having people purposely throw games or hold the team ransom, telling them the only way they won't lose LP is to give the guy RP so he DCs for them.  

Basically, as much as losing LP because of one person's DC sucks, having only the DC-er lose LP opens the system up to a LOT more problems than it solves.  You keep the DC-ers to a minimum by them knowing their DC will not help them in any way and also potentially get them banned when they get reported.
